text: "Cry" is a song recorded by American singer Michael Jackson from his 2001 album Invincible. The song is characterized by its themes of hope, unity, and the power of love. It features a strong, emotive vocal performance by Jackson and incorporates elements of pop and soul. The lyrics encourage listeners to express their emotions and reach out to help others, highlighting a message of compassion and connection. "Cry" is noted for its sweeping melodies and heartfelt message, making it one of the standout tracks on the Invincible album. Category:2001 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Cry (Michael Jackson song)
